unnormalised: ## Are exam prep apps actually worth it? (EdTech Category)
normalised: are exam prep apps actually worth it EdTech category

unnormalised: Okay, so I'm sitting here cramming for my IIT-JEE exams (again!) and wondering – are these exam prep apps like, *actually* helpful, or just another way to distract myself from actually studying? My cousin, Priya, swears by them. She aced her NEET exam using some app that promised "Guaranteed Rank Improvement!" (lol).
normalised: okay so I am sitting here cramming for my I I T J E E exams again and wondering are these exam prep apps like actually helpful or just another way to distract myself from actually studying My cousin Priya swears by them She aced her N E E T exam using some app that promised Guaranteed Rank Improvement laugh out loud

unnormalised: I've tried a few myself. Some seem decent, with practice tests mirroring the actual exam format (useful, I guess). Others are just a chaotic mess of random questions and aggressively chirpy motivational quotes. Like, please, I don't need to be told "You can do it!" every 5 minutes. I need to understand vector calculus!
normalised: I have tried a few myself Some seem decent with practice tests mirroring the actual exam format useful I guess Others are just a chaotic mess of random questions and aggressively chirpy motivational quotes Like please I do not need to be told You can do it every five minutes I need to understand vector calculus

unnormalised: I’m also worried about data usage, especially since my parents are already yelling about my phone bill. Is it really worth blowing through 5GB of data for an app that might not even help? I remember back in 2010, we relied entirely on textbooks and maybe some coaching classes in Kota. Times have changed!
normalised: I am also worried about data usage especially since my parents are already yelling about my phone bill Is it really worth blowing through five gigabyte of data for an app that might not even help I remember back in two thousand and ten we relied entirely on textbooks and maybe some coaching classes in Kota Times have changed

unnormalised: Specifically, I’m wondering if anyone has used apps specifically for the UPSC exam and whether they found it helpful? Or for CAT? I need to finalize my prep strategy before the November 26, 2024 deadline.
normalised: Specifically I am wondering if anyone has used apps specifically for the U P S C exam and whether they found it helpful Or for C A T I need to finalize my prep strategy before the twenty sixth november two thousand and twenty four deadline

unnormalised: Also, are the premium subscriptions worth the Rs. 2500 they're usually asking? Is it better to just stick to free resources and focus on consistent study from 14:00 hrs to 17:00 hrs everyday?
normalised: Also are the premium subscriptions worth the rupees two thousand five hundred they are usually asking Is it better to just stick to free resources and focus on consistent study from fourteen hundred hours to seventeen hundred hours everyday

unnormalised: What's your experience been? Any recommendations (or warnings!) would be greatly appreciated! Trying to avoid a repeat of my last disastrous attempt which happened exactly on January 1st. Help a fellow student out!
normalised: What is your experience been Any recommendations or warnings would be greatly appreciated Trying to avoid a repeat of my last disastrous attempt which happened exactly on january first Help a fellow student out
